title: Miscellaneous Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott, Bart
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: " About a year aster his birth," says his relative and biographer, Mr. Morton, " hisjparents removed to Henlawshiel, alonely cottage, about three miles from Denholm, on the farmof Nether Tofts, which was then held by Mr. Andrew Blythe,bis mother's uncle.
